name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Accomplished Full Stack Developer with 8 years of extensive experience in **Python** and **Full Stack Development**. Adept at managing projects effectively and collaborating with cross-functional teams in remote work environments. I specialize in designing high-performance solutions, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 
Demonstrated success in building secure and compliant applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, applying in-depth knowledge of cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS**. My previous projects include developing enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing. 
Possessing a strong understanding of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, I have hands-on experience in implementing MLOps workflows utilizing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My commitment to maintaining responsibility and accountability ensures successful project outcomes.
